statements: SELECT * FROM PatientClinicalData;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY diagnosis;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE treatment LIKE 'Medication%';
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE outcome IN ('Improved', 'Stable') ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' AND treatment = 'Insulin';
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY outcome;
SELECT patient_id, treatment, outcome FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE treatment LIKE '%Therapy%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, treatment, outcome FROM PatientClinicalData WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, admission_date FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_date, treatment_outcome FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, prescription FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, patient_gender FROM patients GROUP BY patient_gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_outcome LIKE '%recovered%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT record_date, diagnosis FROM health_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_outcome FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT distinct(patient_id) FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN health_records hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE hr.medications LIKE '%Aspirin%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY gender ASC, patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment, doctor FROM medical_records;
SELECT lab_id, test_name, result, date_conducted FROM labs;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT MR.record_id, MR.diagnosis, MR.doctor, L.test_name, L.result FROM medical_records MR JOIN labs L ON MR.record_id = L.record_id;
SELECT P.patient_name, MR.diagnosis, M.medication_name, M.dosage FROM patients P JOIN medical_records MR ON P.patient_id = MR.patient_id JOIN medications M ON MR.record_id = M.record_id;

SELECT P.patient_name, P.date_of_birth, MR.diagnosis, MR.treatment, L.test_name, M.medication_name FROM patients P JOIN medical_records MR ON P.patient_id = MR.patient_id JOIN labs L ON MR.record_id = L.record_id JOIN medications M ON MR.record_id = M.record_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, insurance_type FROM Patients WHERE insurance_type LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, dob ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, gender, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' OR gender = 'Other' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, effectiveness FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords MR INNER JOIN Diagnoses D ON MR.diagnosis_id = D.diagnosis_id INNER JOIN Patients P ON MR.patient_id = P.patient_id WHERE D.diagnosis_category = 'Critical' ORDER BY MR.record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
